title: SDK only release 9.0.101 validation
body:
the the builds for SDK and VS are ready - can you please smoke test that the expected fixes are contained?
Builds:
sdk: [https://dev.azure.com/dnceng/internal/_build/results?buildId=2587446&view=results](https://nam06.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdev.azure.com%2Fdnceng%2Finternal%2F_build%2Fresults%3FbuildId%3D2587446%26view%3Dresults&data=05%7C02%7Cjan.krivanek%40microsoft.com%7Ced7cbb58980b40a84dcd08dd0ce66aac%7C72f988bf86f141af91ab2d7cd011db47%7C1%7C0%7C638680906005821634%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=UvsEJbLsdihkZljWqWKFGfDjUEVidhdyZline%2Bbjm60%3D&reserved=0)
VS: [Pull request 594625: Insert .NET Core SDK 9.0.101 into VS rel/d17.12 - Repos](https://nam06.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdevdiv.visualstudio.com%2FDevDiv%2F_git%2FVS%2Fpullrequest%2F594625&data=05%7C02%7Cjan.krivanek%40microsoft.com%7Ced7cbb58980b40a84dcd08dd0ce66aac%7C72f988bf86f141af91ab2d7cd011db47%7C1%7C0%7C638680906005840361%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=z%2FWD32yARX%2FfUFOqr77HTJ4HJ%2FZ47kAEqV4zga7wcvE%3D&reserved=0)
Expected fixes:
[Pull request 45245: [release/9.0.1xx] Using ConsoleLogger to prevent unexpected behavior (#45015) - Repos](https://nam06.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdev.azure.com%2Fdnceng%2Finternal%2F_git%2Fdotnet-sdk%2Fpullrequest%2F45245&data=05%7C02%7Cjan.krivanek%40microsoft.com%7Ced7cbb58980b40a84dcd08dd0ce66aac%7C72f988bf86f141af91ab2d7cd011db47%7C1%7C0%7C638680906005916437%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=pspknNY2ai%2FXAX7xmMAs75o6bM7XPC4xQaxjk%2BPW7Ck%3D&reserved=0)  fixes [Weird progress indicators started appearing in stdout · Issue #10998 · dotnet/msbuild](https://nam06.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Fdotnet%2Fmsbuild%2Fissues%2F10998&data=05%7C02%7Cjan.krivanek%40microsoft.com%7Ced7cbb58980b40a84dcd08dd0ce66aac%7C72f988bf86f141af91ab2d7cd011db47%7C1%7C0%7C638680906005928827%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=wMJH5FCMvdQ%2BucUGVzQcXlVaXKK5dgUffLMsXkH55e8%3D&reserved=0)
[[vs17.12] Always respect warning-as-error properties by github-actions[bot] · Pull Request #10999 · dotnet/msbuild](https://nam06.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Fdotnet%2Fmsbuild%2Fpull%2F10999&data=05%7C02%7Cjan.krivanek%40microsoft.com%7Ced7cbb58980b40a84dcd08dd0ce66aac%7C72f988bf86f141af91ab2d7cd011db47%7C1%7C0%7C638680906005953593%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=xkbD7g9p%2Bt9hpiyPyqiqBMBAfnDGz1l00biddKSRqv4%3D&reserved=0) fixes [https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/issues/10874](https://nam06.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Fdotnet%2Fmsbuild%2Fissues%2F10874&data=05%7C02%7Cjan.krivanek%40microsoft.com%7Ced7cbb58980b40a84dcd08dd0ce66aac%7C72f988bf86f141af91ab2d7cd011db47%7C1%7C0%7C638680906005965926%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=3XlpkJSbv3HwJQWNbDCeUM9sog3Xq2w%2FSG%2FyaORuD%2Fw%3D&reserved=0)
